name: The Victory India Charitable Tent of Rescue Yacht

address: VICTORY INDIA CHARITABLE TENT OF RESCUE YACHT, SETTIPALLE VILLAGE

briefDescription: The Victory India Charitable Tent of Rescue Yacht, a non-profit organization was started in the month of April 1989 with the sole aim of providing a comprehensive rehabilitation services to all kinds of Differently Abled, Dalit, Tribal and other Backward communities. To realize its objects, victory boarding school for hearing impaired was started in the month of July 1989 under residential care system. The founder started his career as a social worker serving in and around the Kuppam area and come across quite a number of differently abled, Dalit, Tribalâ€™s and other backward communities languishing in poverty. On seeing this he decided to raise their self esteem to glorify His name. This was the result of the beginning of this organization.
